website_summaries.verdict: This 2-piece set isn't for everyone, but is a good choice for cooks who want decorative dishes that double as serve ware.
pros: Pieces stand out for their ruffled tops, bold colors, and floral patterns that make them look just as good on the table as they perform in the oven
cons: On the delicate side, as some owners gripe about cracks and breakage with typical use

customer_reviews.title: I love watching Pioneer Woman and thought I would try these ...
customer_reviews.text: I love watching Pioneer Woman and thought I would try these since I was in need of a new casserole dish. They are a bit heavy but they work great. The two different sizes gives you a bit of versatility. Just give them a spray of cooking oil and clean up is pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: and very heavy I am sure they will stand up to years of good food!
customer_reviews.text: Prettier than the picture, and very heavy I am sure they will stand up to years of good food!
customer_reviews.author: dillon

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful cookware I own!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for ones I had broken after years of use. They are beautiful on the table and I have had many complements. I have recommended them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Emma

customer_reviews.title: These casserole dishes are very pretty. I have used them a couple of times ...
customer_reviews.text: These casserole dishes are very pretty. I have used them a couple of times and they worked well. The only thing is I did find them to be on the heavy side, but I am satisfied with them.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colors
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and colors. I purchased them as a gift & they loved them.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, to be sure and I got them for ...

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for yourself or someone else

product_meta.title: The Pioneer Woman Flea Market 2-Piece Decorated Rectangular Ruffle Top Ceramic Bakeware Set, turquoise & floral baker by BLOSSOMZ
product_meta.description: Update your kitchenware with the Pioneer Woman 2-Piece Ceramic Bakeware Set. It adds elegance and function to the kitchen of any home cook. This set includes one turquoise baker and one floral baker. The pair is ideal for making and serving a variety of cakes and desserts. This rectangular ruffle top silicone bakeware set is safe for cooking in your oven and safe for cleaning in your dishwasher. The Pioneer Woman Flea Market 2-Piece Decorated Rectangular Ruffle Top Ceramic Bakeware Set: 3.6 qt turquoise baker 2.3 qt floral baker Dishwasher-safe Oven-safe Adds a decorative touch to any kitchen Rectangular design Ruffled top Cake bakeware set is made of sillicone Nests for easy storage Large dish: 13" by 9", 3.6 quarts Small dish: 11?" by 8", 2.3 quarts
feature_bullets: Adds a decorative touch to any kitchen
Cake bakeware set is made of sillicone
Rectangular design / Oven-safe / 2.3 qt floral baker
